divs: sighting detailsthis object appeared out of the corner on my eye as a boomerang shape, roughly 1\2 degree across (the size of the full moon), moving from west to east. it traveled at about the same speed as a conventional aricraft, but it was apparently very low (judging by it's speed) and did not make any sound what-so-ever. one would have expected some engine noise at such a low altitude. there were no aircrfaft lights visible through the entire journey across the sky. i thought maybe otis air national guard base was receiving a stealth fighter.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around June 1st 2003
